name: SSF2
title: Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: Peritoneal Cytology
notes: **Note:**  Cytologic examination for malignant cells may be performed on ascites (fluid that has accumulated in the peritoneal cavity in excess amount) or the fluid (saline) that is introduced into the peritoneal cavity, and then removed by suction. The introduction of fluid may be termedperitoneal washing or peritoneal lavage.
rows: Test done, results suspicious or undetermined if negative or positive
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
Test ordered, results not in patient record

Test not done (test not ordered and not performed)
No pathologic specimen available

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
